title: The Marciano Love-Child
description: Alessandro Marciano threw pregnant Scarlett out on the street—this gold digger had betrayed him! Now he has returned—and he has a business proposition for he'll bankrupt her or bed her. The choice is hers….But when Alessandro's faced with the fact that Scarlett's child is his son, there is no choice.Scarlett will be the Marciano bride—willingly or not….
author: Melanie Milburne
